text: Edward Francis (June 3, 1930 - April 11, 2017) was a Roman Catholic bishop. Ordained to the priesthood in 1957, Francis served bishop of the Diocese of Sivagangai, India, from 1987 until 2005.Diocese of Sivagangai profile, gcatholic.org; accessed 30 April 2017. ==See also== *Catholic Church in India ==Notes== Category:1930 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Indian Roman Catholic bishops Category:Place of birth missing Category:Place of death missing
title: Edward Francis (bishop)
